name: Spirit Gold
description: Hello Gaming Community!!! This is my first finished game I've made on RPG maker. I've put a lot of time into it (over 185 hours) and i hope it is enjoyed. A brief explanation for this game would be as follows "Spirit Gold is a very challenging game that focuses on exploration and an odd form of combat that periodicly throws new challenges (and some humor) at you." Playtime is anywhere from 4-10 hours. If you have any suggestions or have found any flaws with the game or just have a comment please notify me. (I apologize for the bad screenshots)
